languages.text: "Техник... сектора... сектора... больно... пощады..." {n}Мутант умолкает на несколько мгновений, после чего его голос начинает звучать тверже.{/n} "Техник третьей котельной... мы... с нижних... уровней..." {n}Стон скрадывет последние слова.{/n}

"Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Техник... сектора... сектора... больно... пощады..." {n}Мутант умолкает на несколько мгновений, после чего его голос начинает звучать тверже.{/n} "Техник третьей котельной... мы... с нижних... уровней..." {n}Стон скрадывет последние слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

"Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

"Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

languages.text: “领班……来自部门……部门……好疼……求你了……”{n}怪物沉默了一会儿，之后又鼓起勇气，发出了声音。{/n}“我是三号锅炉的领班……我们……来自底层……”{n}最后一句话被呻吟声淹没了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “领班……来自部门……部门……好疼……求你了……”{n}怪物沉默了一会儿，之后又鼓起勇气，发出了声音。{/n}“我是三号锅炉的领班……我们……来自底层……”{n}最后一句话被呻吟声淹没了。{/n}

languages.text: «Capataz... del sector... sector... Duele... piedad...» {n}El mutante guarda silencio durante unos momentos, pero luego sigue con voz más fuerte.{/n} «Capataz de la Caldera 3... Somos... de los niveles... inferiores...». {n}Un gemido ahoga sus últimas palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Capataz... del sector... sector... Duele... piedad...» {n}El mutante guarda silencio durante unos momentos, pero luego sigue con voz más fuerte.{/n} «Capataz de la Caldera 3... Somos... de los niveles... inferiores...». {n}Un gemido ahoga sus últimas palabras.{/n}

languages.text: 「現場監督…セクターから…セクター…痛い…慈悲を…」{n}変異体はしばしの間沈黙したが、やがて声を強める。{/n}「第3ボイラーから来た現場監督…我々は…下層から…」{n}最後の言葉はうめき声にかき消された。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「現場監督…セクターから…セクター…痛い…慈悲を…」{n}変異体はしばしの間沈黙したが、やがて声を強める。{/n}「第3ボイラーから来た現場監督…我々は…下層から…」{n}最後の言葉はうめき声にかき消された。{/n}

languages.text: "Vorarbeiter ... aus Sektor ... Sektor ... Schmerzen ... Gnade ..." {n}Der Mutant schweigt für einige Augenblick, doch dann ist seine Stimme stärker.{/n} "Vorarbeiter von Heizkessel 3 ... Wir kommen ... aus den unteren ... Ebenen ..." {n}Die letzten Worte ersticken in einem Stöhnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vorarbeiter ... aus Sektor ... Sektor ... Schmerzen ... Gnade ..." {n}Der Mutant schweigt für einige Augenblick, doch dann ist seine Stimme stärker.{/n} "Vorarbeiter von Heizkessel 3 ... Wir kommen ... aus den unteren ... Ebenen ..." {n}Die letzten Worte ersticken in einem Stöhnen.{/n}

languages.text: « Le contremaître... du secteur... secteur... Douleur... Pitié... » {n}Le mutant se tait quelques instants, puis reprend d'une voix plus forte.{/n} « Le contremaître de la chaufferie n° 3. Nous sommes... des niveaux... inférieurs... » {n}Un gémissement engloutit la fin de sa phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le contremaître... du secteur... secteur... Douleur... Pitié... » {n}Le mutant se tait quelques instants, puis reprend d'une voix plus forte.{/n} « Le contremaître de la chaufferie n° 3. Nous sommes... des niveaux... inférieurs... » {n}Un gémissement engloutit la fin de sa phrase.{/n}

languages.text: "Ustabaşı... Sektör... Sektör... Acıyor... İnsaf..." {n}Mutant, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor. Ardından sesini yükseltiyor.{/n} "3. Kazan'dan ustabaşıyım... Biz... Alt seviyelerde... Yaşıyorduk..." {n}Çıkardığı iniltiler, son sözlerini bastırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foreman... from sector... sector... Hurts... Mercy..." {n}The mutant falls silent for a few moments, but then his voice comes back stronger.{/n} "Foreman from Boiler 3... We're... from the lower... levels..." {n}The final words are drowned out by a moan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Ustabaşı... Sektörden... Sektör... Acıyor... İnsaf...” {n}Mutant, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor. Ardından sesini yükseltiyor.{/n} “3. Kazan’dan bir ustabaşıyım... Biz... Alt seviyelerde... Yaşıyorduk...” {n}Son sözlerini bir inilti bastırıyor.{/n}
